Weymouth_Town.Barnes House (Quincy, Massachusetts): The Barnes House is a historic house at 183 Pine Street, Quincy, Massachusetts. The 2-1/2 story house was built in the 1870s, and is a fine local example of Italianate styling. It is three bays wide, with the first floor left bays taken up by a large projecting bay with four sash windows and a bracketed eave.
